post.content:
If you are qualified for, and interested in, the senior-level Java development position described below, please reply with a current resume ASAP.
RATE: OPEN LOCATION: Downtown Toronto DURATION: 1 year
The Senior Java Developer has extensive industry experience including team leadership and software design responsibilities on multiple projects, while playing a crucial role in the design, development, and support of clinical software applications.
Based in Downtown Toronto, primary responsibilities include developing applications as part of multi-disciplinary teams according to the principles of Agile Software Development, providing customer service and application support, quality testing, performing assignments and special projects as requested. Working closely with the Project Management Office (PMO) the Developer will be a crucial part of the project team during the planning, testing and execution of new applications or functions.
Qualifications - 7+ years of experience in Java development - Experience leading teams in development and maintenance of Java-based, healthcare-related applications - Experience with Scrum and Agile software development methodologies (experience as Scrum Master for projects is desired) - Degree or diploma in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, Health Informatics, or a related field required - Experience with designing and implementing SAML-based federated identity systems - Good communication, interpersonal, organizational, and analytical skills - Willingness to carry a pager/blackberry to respond to emergencies - Experience in the health care field is highly desired
Technologies - HTML, CSS, JavaScript, AJAX - Java Design Patterns, JavaBeans, Struts, Spring Framework, Servlets, JMS, XML, SOAP, Portal/Portlets - Eclipse or similar Java IDE - Oracle / SQL Server - Perl, Python or Ruby - Unix/Linux or Microsoft Windows development
Thanks for your interest.... JIM
